2 quick notes:

> <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
> <HTML><HEAD>
> <META HTTP-EQUIV="Content-Type" CONTENT="text/html; charset=iso-8859-1">

1) don't post html mails

>       results of the output are not mixed with the results of the 
>       TestCase.  So, if I have lots of debugging messages, the output is 
>       not with the failure.  I have to work a bit to make it fit.

2) The _main_ goal of JUnit is to _remove_ the debugging messages from the console...

-Vladimir
